title: Generate Items
description: In this lab, we will explore and practice various JavaScript programming concepts such as array manipulation, object creation, and function composition. The purpose of this lab is to help you develop your skills in JavaScript programming by providing hands-on exercises that cover fundamental concepts. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to use JavaScript to solve common programming problems.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
